author: Order Toll Free by Phone - Dedicated Customer Service Specialists
title: The Cure Presale Tickets at Hollywood Bowl, UIC Pavilion & Madison Square Garden On Sale Today at TicketProcess.com
text:
Legendary British rockers announced their intentions to tour the land to the left of the Atlantic. Robert Smith has been the one constant throughout the history of the band who begin making music in the mid-70s in West Sussex, England and rose to prominence throughout Great Britain and in America in the mid-to-late 80s. The Cure cranked out a gripping, dark brand of Gothic alternative rock in their early years. They have toned it down slightly in terms of intensity in the decades since. Their live tours will feature of vast trip through their entire history.
An early-June concert is scheduled to go down in Chicago at the UIC Pavilion, and the band will play Madison Square Garden in New York City on the evening of June 18, 2016. At least 20 more tour dates will be announced in the upcoming weeks, and it will mark the first full-size North American tour in eight years.
The Cure has released a total of 13 studio albums, the most recent coming back in 2008. They were at their most productive in the 1980s, when they released a total of seven studio albums, culminating with Kiss Me, Kiss Me, Kiss Me in 1987 and Disintegration in 1989. They have sold well over 30 million CDs, records and full album downloads worldwide, propelled by a following known to travel large distances to see them play live. Three big opportunities are currently available today TicketProcess.com, and more are sure to be announced in the near future.

About TicketProcess.com

Seven-days-a-week customer service combined with a 100% satisfaction guarantee has proved to be a simple yet effective strategy for the constantly growing online secondary ticket market. All fans of live entertainment are openly welcome to visit the easily accessible site and purchase their tickets with the confidence that comes with a proven track record.
Following TicketProcess.com on Facebook, Twitter and Google+ will give you direct access to exclusive announcements and free discount codes, allowing you to access to all possible advantages in terms of purchasing the best ticket at the best possible price.
